BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Signal.Internal.delay#
BlackBox.type:
delay#
  :: HasCallStack             -- ARG[0]
  => Clock domain gated       -- ARG[1]
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[2]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Signal.Internal.register#
BlackBox.type:
register#
  :: HasCallStack             -- ARG[0]
  => Clock domain gated       -- ARG[1]
  -> Reset domain synchronous -- ARG[2]
  -> a                        -- ARG[3]
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[4]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Signal.Internal.clockGate
BlackBox.type:
clockGate
  :: Clock domain gated -- ARG[0]
  -> Signal domain Bool -- ARG[1]
  -> Clcok domain 'Gated

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Signal.Internal.clockGen
BlackBox.type:
clockGen
  :: (domain ~ Dom nm period -- ARG[0]
     ,KnownSymbol nm         -- ARG[1]
     ,KnownNat period)       -- ARG[2]
  => Signal domain Bool      -- ARG[3]
  -> Clock domain Source

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Signal.Internal.asyncResetGen
CLaSH.Signal.Internal.syncResetGen
CLaSH.Signal.Internal.unsafeToAsyncReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeToAsyncReset :: Signal domain Bool -> Reset domain Asynchronous
